title: Burning Timber
description: Madison Pike’s cushy life as one of New York City’s most sought-after lawyers can’t replace the loss of her twin sister and the life she could have had with her high school sweetheart, rich rancher Jordan Kingston. She longs for the truth about her sister's disappearance and craves the emotional fulfillment and physical passion only Jordan can give her.Then longtime friend Detective Roger Hanoy from her home town of Timberton, Louisiana calls about a new investigation. Things are not what they seem. Will this destroy her emotional barriers and her relationship with the law firm’s very attractive senior partner?The challenge to her willpower, and most precarious of all, her heart, proves to be the most complex conflict she's ever had to face. When Jordan offers to help, Madison is drawn into a maze of lies, danger, and raw passion that uncovers unimaginable truths.
author: Baynns M. Finnleigh
